Text.Page:
This place is littered with gravesâ€”cairns with makeshift headstones. The fallen deserve better.

Vulcan wastewalkers are to blame. They're bloodthirsty animals. Now I too thirst for blood!

Alas, my duty is here. Bring me the horns of vulcans and we can put these souls to rest...together.
Our comrades can finally rest in peace. You've lifted a heavy weight off my heart. I can't thank you enough.

Kill the vulcans!

If not for the dead, do it for the living, that they might see another day.
